definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
according to a report/It is reported that...

sentences.english: Five more deaths were reported overnight.
The recovery of added methylmercury was reported to be approximately 90% .
sentences.chinese: 添加的甲基汞的回收率據報到達90左右。

sentences.english: What kind of ice reported in area around Tianjin harbour?
sentences.chinese: 據報在天津港附近有什麼樣的冰。

sentences.english: The pond reportedly spewed radiation directly into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 據報，該存儲池把輻射直接泄漏至大氣中。

sentences.english: The teacher reportedly assaulted a student.
sentences.chinese: 該教師據報曾襲擊一名學生。

sentences.english: The paparazzi who had been chasing her reportedly failed to call the rescue services.
sentences.chinese: 追着她坐駕的狗仔隊據報，並沒有報警。

sentences.english: There have been reports that they were hijacked by pirates, but no one can prove that.
sentences.chinese: 據報他們被海盜劫持了，但沒有人能夠證實這一點。

sentences.english: Coincidentally, Zhejiang was widely reported as the origin of the salt-buying panic in mid-March.
sentences.chinese: 事出巧合，據報，浙江是此次搶鹽風波的源頭。
